wikipedia_page.main: William Holden (born 1860) was an English footballer who played in The Football League for Blackburn Rovers.

response: William Holden (1918–1981) was an American film actor.
William Holden may also refer to:
* William Holden (journalist) (1808–1897), writer for South Australian Register and Adelaide Observer
* William Holden (politician) (1867–1871), 11th Lieutenant Governor of California
